title: Fundamentals of VOF-ML Techniques for Compressible Flow Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Training course for technical professionals to master compressible flow analysis techniques in a simulated environment. Enhances visual learning through VR integration

learning_goals: Explain and apply at least three operating principles of the VOF-ML algorithm
A step-by-step procedure can be established to address interface tracking issues in compressible flow simulations
Verification methods for machine learning-based numerical analysis techniques (accuracy, symmetry preservation, etc.) can be applied to real-world cases
Simulation results of dual-material systems containing shock waves can be quantitatively evaluated
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
